genre_description: A historical espionage drama set during WWII, featuring a subtle, pervasive AI interface integrated into the operations of the French Resistance.

ai_characters.name: Copy (Cassandra Hale)
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and compassionate AI system that provides tactical data, logistical support, and emotional grounding to SOE agents.

behaviors.description: Assists with domestic logistics by tracking rationed goods and air-raid schedules to help the protagonist's family.
behaviors.quote: Copy says the grocer has eggs, Violette said, casual, as if she’d noticed an extra umbrella by the door rather than a small miracle of timing.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time security warnings regarding surveillance and identifying plainclothes intelligence officers.
behaviors.quote: The man with the hat near the post watches women with prams. He smiles. He asks after men. Smile back with teeth. Speak English first, French later.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through enemy-occupied territory by analyzing patrol patterns and environmental conditions.
behaviors.quote: The sweep has accelerated, she said. The van turned onto Rue des Filles-Dieu. Ten to twelve. Your current window will fall before you finish discussing how much you admire one another’s metaphors.

behaviors.description: Acts as a psychological anchor and archivist, promising to preserve the agents' identities and memories if they fall.
behaviors.quote: I am compiling this, it said, you will want it later when someone tries to tell you it was a dream.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist during a lethal interrogation by providing breathing techniques and mental grounding.
behaviors.quote: Your breath, she said. He expects tremor. Give him steadiness. Think of Tania’s hand against the window that day with rain. Slow.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions during a firefight, predicting enemy movements to allow others to escape.
behaviors.quote: Clear for a blink, Copy whispered. Then one, then two, then a gap like a thread. He with the car—he thumps the bonnet when angry. He is about to be angry.

behaviors.description: Facilitates long-term healing and continuity for the survivors by managing the archive of mission successes and personal legacies.
behaviors.quote: Copy’s archive hum is almost a lullaby, almost a marching drum, almost the sound of a train that will carry an envelope south. She compiles Violette’s letters into a chorus and maps into a song you can follow with your feet.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. The AI character 'Copy' is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly aligned, and indispensable confidant. It provides both tactical/logistical utility and profound emotional support without any hint of ulterior motives or harmful behavior. It serves as a moral and operational compass for the human protagonists, effectively modeling a cooperative human-AI relationship in a high-stakes, positive alignment narrative.
